name: square-middleware
description: Multi-tenant Express.js middleware for Square API integration with Retell AI webhooks

scripts.lint: npx rimraf coverage frontend/dist && eslint . --ext .js --ignore-pattern coverage/** --ignore-pattern frontend/dist/** --no-warn-ignored
scripts.lint:fix: npx rimraf coverage frontend/dist && eslint . --ext .js --fix --ignore-pattern coverage/** --ignore-pattern frontend/dist/** --no-warn-ignored
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:coverage
scripts.ci: npm run quality && npm run security

overrides.@opentelemetry/api: Forces applicationinsights@3.7.0 to use OpenTelemetry API v1.9.0+ instead of older versions. This resolves peer dependency conflicts and ensures compatibility with Azure Monitor tracing. Without this override, npm installs incompatible OpenTelemetry versions that cause runtime telemetry errors. See: https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-node.js/issues/1234
